summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of L.I.D. No. 6682 for the improvement of Rainier Ave. S. from S. Thayer St. to 57th Ave. S.; by constructing watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances; under Ordinance No. 105975, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a local improvement fund.
